hero_subtitle: Cozy accommodation near the sea for a truly relaxing stay.
acc_p1: Casa Nina is a cozy holiday home in south-west Sardinia, ideal for couples and families looking for peace, nature, and an authentic Mediterranean vibe.
acc_p2: The accommodation is located in a quiet area near the sea and offers a comfortable base for relaxing and exploring the island. You will love the authentic Sardinian atmosphere, nearby beaches, and unspoiled nature.
acc_p3: Casa Nina is a great choice for guests who want a calm seaside stay, enjoy spending time outdoors, and want to experience Sardinia at its natural pace.
acc_p4: Start your morning with a coffee on the balcony with sea views, spend the day at the beach, and end the evening in a relaxed mood with excellent Italian food in local restaurants.
acc_info_layout: Layout: 2 separate bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and toilet
acc_info_living: Living area with a fully equipped kitchenette and a sofa bed for 2 guests
acc_info_exterior: Outdoor: sea-view balcony, courtyard with BBQ

info_p1: The accommodation is suitable for 1‚Äì8 guests.
info_p2: On the first floor there is a living room with a kitchenette fully equipped with dishes, an electric oven, a gas stove and a coffee machine. There is also a dining table, a comfortable sofa bed for 2 guests and a TV. There is also a bathroom with a shower, toilet and bidet.
info_p3: In the basement there is a bedroom with a double bed and 2 single beds, a workspace, and a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and bidet.
info_p4: On the first floor there is another bedroom for 2 guests with a double bed, a dresser, a small sea-view balcony, and a private bathroom with a toilet and shower.
info_p5: A washing machine and dryer are available.
info_p6: Towels and fully equipped bathrooms with toiletries are provided. A hairdryer and iron are also available.
info_towels_warning: Towels are not for beach use!
info_p7: The accommodation is pet-friendly regardless of your pet‚Äôs size or type. Pets stay free of charge.
info_p8: Wi-Fi is available throughout the apartment.
info_p9: Parking is available in the courtyard in front of the apartment or on the street.
loc_p1: Casa Nina is located in a quiet part of south-west Sardinia, in the charming town of Calasetta, close to beautiful beaches, coastal trails and traditional Sardinian restaurants.
loc_p2: Calasetta lies on the island of Sant‚ÄôAntioco ‚Äî a true paradise for cyclists, with quiet roads, stunning sea views and routes suitable for both easy rides and more challenging trips.
loc_p3: An ideal base for exploring the island while still enjoying peace and privacy.
